sentence.Network_en: It was a disappointing performance which lacked finesse.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'purity, delicacy': from French, related to fine

entry.def: If you do something with finesse, you do it with great skill and style.

example.ex: ...handling momentous diplomatic challenges with tact and finesse.
example.tran: 运用机智和策略处理重大外交难题

means.word_mean: 1. subtly skillful handling of a situation
